fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.gui

Class ActionGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.gui.GuiBase
      • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.gui.InventoryGui
        • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.gui.ActionGui
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExplorerGui

    public abstract class ActionGui
extends InventoryGui
    This class implements an action-based GUI. Actions are buttons which trigger an event when getting clicked on by the user. They are represented by (customizable) items, which are immutable by the user.

    Events handlers are (usually private) methods implemented in the derived class(es). They are named using the pattern 'action_[action name]', and are called when the associated action is triggered. They take an optional argument (add it if you need it): the InventoryClickEvent triggered.

    Author:
    ProkopyL (main) and Amaury Carrade

      • action

        protected void action(String name,
                      int slot,
                      org.bukkit.Material material,
                      String title,
                      String... loreLines)
        Creates a new action, represented by the given item. The item's metadata is changed to use the given title and lore.
        Parameters:
        name - The identifier of the action.
        slot - The slot the action will be placed on.
        material - The material used to represent the action.
        title - The title the item will show.
        loreLines - The lore the item will show.

      • action

        protected ItemStackBuilder action(String name,
                                  int slot)
        Creates a new action, represented by no item. This action will not be rendered to the user until updateAction(java.lang.String, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack, java.lang.String) is called.
        Parameters:
        name - The identifier of the action.
        slot - The slot the action will be placed on.
        Returns:
        an ItemStackBuilder ItemStackBuilder to build the representing item

      • action

        protected ItemStackBuilder action(String name,
                                  int slot,
                                  org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Creates a new action, and adds it to the GUI.
        Parameters:
        name - The identifier of the action.
        slot - The slot the action will be placed on.
        item - The item used to represent the action.
        Returns:
        an ItemStackBuilder ItemStackBuilder to build the representing item, or null if it was already specified.

      • updateAction

        protected void updateAction(String name,
                            org.bukkit.Material item,
                            String title)
        Updates the action represented by the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the action to update.
        item - The new material to affect to the action.
        title - The new title to affect to the action.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If no action has the given name.
